description: small paragraphs, lines of text, words, letters, bar of music scattered throughout image, in black and red; abstract cloudy areas of color and spots of color over text in red, khaki, forest green and medium blue
inscription:
Signature, Date, Inscription and Mark

below LLC of image, in pencil: [Trial Proof]; on back, in pencil: [71-138 / (illegible) / Rives / BFK / II]
markings: LLC, impressed in paper: unidentifed chop; at bottom edge of sheet, LLQ, impressed in paper: image of chair
provenance: The artist, Santa Barbara (gave to Moir); Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (before 1983-until d.2010; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: below LRC of image, in pencil : [W Dole 1971]
title: Generalba
